title: Add autonomously-nightly tag with autonomous-readiness behavior
description: Add a new add-on tag 'autonomously-nightly' that can be applied alongside any existing issue type (feature, bug, task). When present, it signals the ticket will be implemented by an AI agent running the full workflow autonomously with no human at the gates. Because of this, tickets with this tag must pass a 2-3 round Q&A review protocol before being marked ready. Changes required: (1) Create new autonomous-readiness.xml behavior defining the Q&A review protocol, (2) Register it in BEHAVIORS_MANIFEST.xml, (3) Update entry.xml to reference the behavior when the tag is present, (4) Update human-gate.xml autonomous-mode to reference autonomous-readiness as a prerequisite, (5) Add branch-prefix or tag handling in git-with-beads.xml for the add-on tag, (6) Add 'auto-nightly' GitHub label mapping in beads-sync.sh, (7) Document the new label in beads_sync.md.

title: install.sh: ensure .gitignore does not exclude beads/starterpack files
description: Some target repos have .gitignore patterns that exclude .beads/, .starterpack/, .claude/, or *.jsonl files. The install script should detect and fix these patterns during install so the auto-commit includes all necessary files. Add a step between file copy and auto-commit that checks the root .gitignore and removes/negates problematic patterns.
close_reason: Added gitignore negation step to install.sh and set VERSION to v0.10.0
